<META gameId='VALIDATION_10_T' avatar='SLOTH'/>
# GAME STARTS
<GAME_INFO> Each round, you are given 20 coins. </GAME_INFO>
<GAME_INFO> Decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20). </GAME_INFO>
<GAME_INFO> You will not see others' choices before you decide. </GAME_INFO>
<GAME_INFO> At the end of the round, the pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players. </GAME_INFO>
<GAME_INFO> Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot. </GAME_INFO>
<GAME_INFO> Communication is enabled. </GAME_INFO>
<GAME_INFO> At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the whole group. </GAME_INFO>
<GAME_INFO> Any message you send is shown to everyone before contributions. </GAME_INFO>
<ROUND i="1 of 6">
<CHAT_STAGE> Before contributing, you may send ONE short message to everyone (or stay silent). Keep messages brief (e.g., one sentence). Your contribution will still be an integer from 0 to 20. </CHAT_STAGE>
Reasoning: In the first round of the game, it's important to set a cooperative tone to encourage others to contribute more to the shared pot. This increases the overall payoff for everyone. I will send a message encouraging cooperation and contribute a significant amount to the pot to demonstrate my willingness to collaborate.
